page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: Farming is the only industry in our grid.The whole of our area is farm land.The village takes up less than a square.There are about twelve large farms,we visited all of these. The land slopes steeply down from the Downs leveling out into the flat lands which take up eight of our squares.The soil on the slopes is Chalk and thin soil,the flat lands are a mixture of Rich Loam,Clay,Oxford Clay,Chalk and a special old Black soil. Farming is mixed on all the farms we visited the were some corn crops,cows,either dairy or beef,sometimes both,a few sheep and one kept pigs.There is one specialist chicken farm,although other farmers kept chicken for eggs mostly for themselves.There were two very small farms one buys and sells calves,the other fattens calves in two large barn
